nml_mods_list_description:
Here are your mods.
You can enable, disable or configure your mods.
NeoModLoader Update Complete:
NeoModLoader has been updated to version {0}.
Please restart the game to apply the update.
ModLinkRequest: NeoModLoader will request for privilege to install BepInEx mods after you close this window.
FailedAutoUpdate:
Failed to update NeoModLoader
Please restart as Administrator
 If failed again
 Please update manually
 See How to install NeoModLoader manually
DiscordAuth Description:
Redirect to Discord to authenticate your account
Requires you having Modder role in Worldbox Discord channel
GithubAuth Description:
Redirect to Github to authenticate your account
Requires you to join WorldBoxOpenMods
WorldBoxOpenMods is an organization on Github
SkipAuth Description:
Skip authentication
Upload mod to 'Unverified Mod'
NeoModLoader Updated: NeoModLoader Updated, please restart the game.
ModReload Title:
Reload Mod
<color=red>DO NOT USE IT IF YOU ARE NOT DEVELOPER</color>
NeoModLoader Report: Click to report bug or suggest new feature
mod_load_failed_description:
Failed to load mod
Click to disable it
Please check the mod is valid
